title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Virtual Case-Based Learning Design for Medical School Graduate Students

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more methods to maintain critical thinking and problem-solving skills using Virtual Case-Based Learning (VCL).
Learners can design and apply two or more formative assessment tools to measure learner engagement in blended learning environments.
Learners can present three or more technical/operational strategies to enhance accessibility of virtual learning materials.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
